column6: "GODS AND SOLDIERS" PART FOUR - THE INVADERS incursion into Hala, the Kree Homeworld, has begun...and already our heroes are in trouble. - Now the team must fight a Kree-controlled God, but which God? From which pantheon? And how can they defeat an immortal with unlimited power? - See NAMOR unleashed, CAPTAIN AMERICA fight and THE HUMAN TORCH turn up the heat!!! - And what is the dangerous side mission that only WINTER SOLDIER and AARKUS THE GOLDEN AGE VISION can complete?
column8: | artist:Steve Pugh | writer:James Robinson | penciller (cover):Mukesh Singh
